tests.title: [@positive1] search user by valid ID
tests.fullTitle: [@get-data] GET testcases [@positive1] search user by valid ID
tests.code:
let response = await api.getUserById(targetID);
expect(response.status).to.equal(200); //status code check
expect(response.body.id).to.equal(targetID); //ID check
expect(response.body).jsonSchema(jsonSchemaGet); //schema check

tests.fullTitle: [@get-data] GET testcases [@negative1] search user by invalid ID

beforeHooks.fullTitle: [@update-data] PUT testcases "before all" hook in "[@update-data] PUT testcases"

afterHooks.fullTitle: [@update-data] PUT testcases "after all" hook in "[@update-data] PUT testcases"

tests.title: [@positive1] update occupation and nationality data
tests.fullTitle: [@update-data] PUT testcases [@positive1] update occupation and nationality data
tests.code:
//update ID and other datas
updateData.id=targetID
let occupationUpdate = "Soccer Player"
let nationalityUpdate = "Indonesian"
updateData.occupation = occupationUpdate
updateData.nationality = nationalityUpdate

     
let response = await api.putUser(updateData);
expect(response.status).to.equal(200); //status code check
expect(response.body.id).to.equal(targetID); //ID check
expect(response.body).to.contain.like({occupation: occupationUpdate, nationality: nationalityUpdate}); //data check
expect(response.body).jsonSchema(jsonSchemaPut); //schema check
